price: (Nkͻmhyεni), obi a asotwee no asεm no nokorε atia no no, wobetumi agye nea ͻwͻ Ogya no mu no nkwa?
arabic: أَفَمَنۡ حَقَّ عَلَيۡهِ كَلِمَةُ ٱلۡعَذَابِ أَفَأَنتَ تُنقِذُ مَن فِي ٱلنَّارِ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afaman ḥaqqa ʿalayhi kalimatu al-ʿadhābi afa-anta tunqidhu man fī al-nāri
